constraints.name: distinctness
constraints.description: 在操作过程中，如果新加入的元素与序列中的某个元素相同，则移除该元素及其之后的所有元素，直到序列中没有重复元素为止。
constraints.formal: For each operation i, if a[i] is in the sequence s, remove all elements from s starting from the first occurrence of a[i] to the end of s.

constraints.name: query_limit
constraints.description: 查询是在线进行的，每个查询的结果用于解码下一个查询。
constraints.formal: Each query (l_i, r_i) is decoded using the answer of the previous query (lastans): l_i = l'_i ⊕ lastans, r_i = r'_i ⊕ lastans. If no queries have been answered, lastans = 0.
